value.0: Welcome to the bank.  How may I assist you, <lad/lass>?
There are five spoken commands you may simply say.  Deposit, Withdraw, Deposit All, Withdraw All, and Balance.
Simply say "balance" when you want to know what your current balance is.  I will check the books and tell you.
Simply say, "withdraw all", and all of your gold will be withdrawn from your account!
Simply say, "deposit all", and all of your gold will be deposited to your account!
Simply say, "withdraw 100 gold", and 100 gold will be withdrawn from your account!  Tell me any amount, and I shall withdraw it for you.
Simply say, "deposit 100 gold", and 100 gold will be deposited to your account!  Tell me any amount, and I shall deposit it for you.
What would you like to learn about in particular?
Our banks allow for a variety of advanced banking options and practices.  To learn about loans, ask me about advanced banking options if you are by the bank.
There is also an interest rate for depositers.  This interest rate changes depending on the economy.  You can find out about the current interest rate on deposits by speaking to me about that.
Bullion bonds are officially-sealed documents which represent a sum of gold.  You can acquire bullion bonds for large sums of gold.
They are best used when trading large amounts of gold between different people.  In essence, they are redeemable bank notes for sums larger than what is advised to be carried around.
Ah, yes!  We can now store up to thirty items for you in the Item Bank Vault chest near me.  All you need to do is purchase the rights to store items.  You can do this when you first talk with me.
You may withdraw money that you have deposited at any time.  In order to make a withdrawal, you must have gold in your account.
You may also check your balance by asking me about it if you come by the bank.
We can hold gold for you if you want a safe place to keep it.  In addition, the bank adds interest to your account if you deposit with us.
Since we make loans to others, we pay interest for depositers.  The bank keeps a small amount of the interest itself to pay for upkeep.
You must go under the advanced banking options in order to assess interest on your account.  You must do this at least once every five weeks, for that's as long as we keep records.
You can keep your money here forever, but the records for interest are only kept for that amount of time.
Our banks are the finest in the world! What would you like to deal with?
Your account has <CUSTOM25> gold pieces.  We can assess your interest if you wish.
Your credit rating is <CUSTOM20>.  We can offer you a loan with a <CUSTOM21>%.  The percentage is applied once a week.
Loans are made from our bank using gold we have in the vaults.  People deposit their gold here, and we loan it out to those who need it.
People who deposit receive a small interest on gold in their account, and those who have outstanding loans pay interest to make up for it.
You currently owe <CUSTOM23> at <CUSTOM21>%.  How much would you like to pay?
What sort of loan would you like to take out?
You already have a loan outstanding.  You cannot take out new loans while you have debt.
You currently owe <CUSTOM23> at <CUSTOM21>%.  How much would you like to pay?
Are you interested in redeeming a bullion bond for gold or transfering gold into a bond?
In what amount would you like a bullion bond?
Very well!  The cost for permanent item storage is 100 gold coins.
How much gold do you wish to withdraw?
How much gold do you wish to deposit?
The current interest rate on deposits is <CUSTOM30>%.  This is assessed if you have money in the bank for at least one week.
